Site_description: Pelagic deep hole site of Carvins Cove Reservoir near dam (also site 6 for Ironman sampling); the closest access point to the dam via boat and 21 m at full pond
Location of precipitation sampler on the CCR dam
Pleagic site in Carvins Cove Reservoir at end of Horsepen Branch Cove (also labeled site C-C4); can be sampled at aprox 13m at full pond
Cove site in Carvins Cove Reservoir along the Horsepen Branch Cove (also labeled site C-C3)
Cove site in Carvins Cove Reservoir along the Horsepen Branch Cove (also labeled site C-C2); site can completely dry; sampled with a 25m radius of GPS point each time
Cove site in Carvins Cove Reservoir along the Horsepen Branch Cove (also labeled site C-C1); site completely dries for part of year

Pool site in Carvins Cove Reservoir along the Horsepen Branch stream chanel before entering the reservoir (also labeled site C-P2); site transition from pool to stream like and can completely dries for part of year; sampled with a 25m radius of GPS point each time

Pool site in Carvins Cove Reservoir along the Horsepen Branch stream chanel before entering the reservoir (also labeled site C-P1); site transition from pool to stream like and can completely dries for part of year; sampled with a 25m radius of GPS point each time
Inflow stream site to Carvins Cove Reservoir at Horse Pen Branch
Inflow stream site to Carvins Cove Reservoir where Horse Pen Branch meets the reservoir and is a standing water inflow (downstream of site 100)
